snippet.title: Snow Bros. Wonderland - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | TGS 2023
snippet.description:
Nick and Tom, the twin brothers with a heart of cold, make their return in the upcoming game, Snow Bros. Wonderland. Watch the latest Snow Bros. Wonderland trailer to see gameplay, enemies, and more. Snow Bros. Wonderland will be available on Nintendo® Switch, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 5.

Snow Bros. Wonderland has the brothers defending Snow Land from The Great King of Evil. Armed with an endless supply of ice pellets, you can turn monsters into snowballs which can be kicked to destroy a whole horde of enemies. Chain your attacks to defeat several bad guys at once and use your snowball skills to take down massive bosses.
